body_html:
@angelleng i couldn't get this fixed in this release, will do in the next one.
For now you have three options:

  • install binaries via anaconda
  • install from source
  • install from docker

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#installation

Either will fix this.

body:
@angelleng i couldn't get this fixed in this release, will do in the next one. 
For now you have three options:
- install binaries via anaconda
- install from source
- install from docker

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#installation

Either will fix this.
